name: Project Parkour
description:
The goal of my project is to develop an exhilarating third-person parkour game that tests players' ability to master various parkour moves in order to go past challenging obstacles and advance through the game's stages. In the game, players assume the role of an expert parkour runners who must make their way through a city area that is full of structures, alleyways, and other hazards.

Players will need to execute a variety of parkour techniques, such as wall running, leaping, sliding, and vaulting, in order to advance through the game's stages. A strong physics engine will also be included in the game, simulating realistic movement and enabling players to chain together challenging actions to travel across the terrain.

The overall objective of this project is to develop a parkour game that is gratifying and demanding, with rich and intuitive gameplay. I think that this kind of game has the ability to hold players' attention for lengthy periods of time, and I'm eager to realize my vision through this endeavor.

How to Play 

ActionControlRun Hold W Key Slide Press LShift Key Perform Parkour Press SPACE Key Look Around Move Mouse Fight Left Mouse Button
